definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: A draft upon my neighbour was to me the same as money.
sentences.chinese: 我以爲用支票向鄰居支款，同現錢一樣。

sentences.english: The company is short of cash at the moment.
He offered to work out the debt, but I needed the money more.
sentences.chinese: 他提出做工來抵債，可是我更需要現錢。

sentences.english: The guy had a reputation for selling good acid so I happily gave him my cash.
sentences.chinese: 那傢伙賣好酸是出了名的，我很痛快地把現錢給了他。

sentences.english: You know he'll try to hit us up for cash.
sentences.chinese: 你是知道的，他會試着向我們要現錢。

sentences.english: This time I have cash. Give me the good wine.
I haven't got any cash. Can you change a fifty-dollar traveler's check?
sentences.chinese: 我沒有現錢，您能找開一張五十元的旅行支票嗎？
